reviews.review: Curti, o estilo de jogo, mecânicas, gráficos, os sobreviventes, a interface de níveis, etc, não sou contra monetização de comésticos, mas n curti ter monetizado os assassinos, pois altera a forma de se jogar, é algo meu, fora isso o jogo em si é muito bom, recomendo !
достаточно интересная игра

Yo fam, this game is off the Heezy if you have three other MOFO's to play with. I would not recommend going into this alone because there are a lot of hackers,cheaters and trolls. Also be sure to lower your mic because if you solo and you end up with three random squeekers be ready to get ear rape when they be screaming AHHHHH HEELLP AHHH ITS ON  ME AHHHH. You will however enjoy this game if you got homiez to chill wid on discord ya feel me dawg. All and all, this game is very fun, this is where i met my first relationship FRFR. if you're single and ready to mingle, a survivor horror game will definitely pull you some hot screaming actions.

Dead by Daylight:
- Gameplay is unbalanced playing on survivor meet someone that buy killer with auric cells for 10 euro or 5 euro and get some advantages to win the match, when playing killer you meet high ranked survivors and matchmaking is broken, and also it looks like a pay to win game.
- Sometimes this game have a bug which disconnect random and lose your progress. 
+ The only good thing is just graphics that looks ok.

เกมแห่งความไม่สมดุล ฆาตกรคือลูกรักของเกม

Dead by Daylight
เกมเอาตัวรอดผู้เล่น 5 คน โดยที่ 1 คนจะเป็นผู้ล่า และอีก 4 คน จะเป็นผู้รอดชีวิต
ผู้รอดชีวิตต้องปั่นเครื่องปั่นไฟให้ครบ 5 เครื่อง และหาทางออก ส่วนผู้ล่าต้องฆ่าให้หมด

เกมนี้แย่มากในด้านเซิฟเวอร์ หลุดบ่อย เซิฟไม่สเถียร อีกทั้งเกมนี้ยังบัฟให้ผู้ล่าโหด ตีทะลุหน้าต่าง ตีทะลุไม้
หากต้องการจะเล่นผู้รอดชีวิต แนะนำให้เล่นกับเพื่อน ไม่เช่นนั้นคุณจะไม่มีทางรอดเลย อีกทั้งยังมีพวกใช้โปรแกรมโกง เดินไว เดินทะลุอีก และเกมนี้ขึ้นชื่อเรื่องบั๊กเลย บั๊กเยอะเต็มไปหมด ติดอยู่ในตู้ ติดอยู่ในไม้ จมดิน สารพัดบั๊กอีกเยอะแยะมากมาย

after playing about 270+ hours of Dead By Daylight, this game is worth buying. yes it has its fair share of bugs but so do most games. and is still very fun to play most of the time

Asymmetrical gameplay, heavy horror themes, and a vibrant community. Dead by Daylight is a fine game that is constantly being worked on. When you first start out as a survivor the gameplay is immersive and thrilling, and eventually opens up into a nuanced if sometimes frustrating co-op experience. There is a diverse pool of characters to choose from with unique strengths that lean on different playstyles - efficiently doing objectives, boldly baiting the Killer into chases, or surviving on your own to escape at the last second. As you level the different characters you can blend playstyles together by acquiring their perks as "teachables" to other characters, creating your own build. 

For me, the real thrill is playing the Killer. You're in a 4v1 and the odds are often against you, especially if the survivors are experienced and working together. The killers also have unique and diverse playstyles that can be shared in the same way as survivors. You can be highly technical and focus on winning, or have fun at lower levels trying to create jumpscares and terrifying less experienced players. The game has an array of killers unique to the game, as well as some licensed characters from horror franchises - such as Michael Myers and Freddy Krueger. Each goes about their killing in their own satisfying way. 

The game has had some flaws and continues to have some - DCers, inconsistent servers, long wait times, and a somewhat grindy progression system, but all in all the gameplay is satisfying and addicting for a good little while. A perfect game to jump into when it goes on sale around Halloween, as I did two years ago.
